item.title: GRIFFON CORP 10-K
item.description: GRIFFON CORP, which is in the Metal Doors, Sash, Frames, Molding & Trim [3442] industry, SEC 10-K filing on November 18, 2022 had 39204 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
